entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023
